thread.title: Solid NYC Hotel -
thread.title_full: Solid NYC Hotel - Review of Cambria Hotel & Suites - New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Abby W
title: Solid NYC Hotel -
text: I've stayed here many times on business. Hotel staff is always friendly and rooms are always clean. Although they don't get as cool as I'd like, maintenance always helps when I get too hot. Shower is lovely. Bar is very nice to have. Location is awesome. Rates very reasonable (for NYC!). Would recommend to anyone!
